pieces

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • pieces.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Asad Dar, Tim Katzgrau This class will represent the Piece superclass that other pieces are based off of

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean canSkipOver
      a boolean specifying whether this piece can jump over others or not
      char color
      a character used to represent the color for the team this piece is on
      boolean doubleFlag
      a boolean specifying whether this piece jumped 2 spaces

      a character used to represent the color for the team this piece is on
      java.lang.String position
      a String used to mark the position of the piece
      char type
      a character used to denote the type of piece the piece is

      • canDoMove

        public abstract boolean canDoMove(ChessBoard board,
                                  int startColumn,
                                  int startRow,
                                  int endColumn,
                                  int endRow)
        Parameters:
        board - the chess board that is being used to play
        startColumn - index for the column the piece is starting at
        startRow - index for the row the piece is starting at
        endColumn - index for the column the piece is ending at
        endRow - index for the row the piece is ending at
        Returns:
        whether the move can occur

        Parameters:

        startRow - index for the row the piece is starting at
        endColumn - index for the column the piece is ending at
        endRow - index for the row the piece is ending at
        singleStep - whether the piece can only move one piece at a time or not

        whether the move is valid
